players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. We should all work together to find out who did this."

Bob: "Charlie's death is a tragic reminder that we must be vigilant and work together to uncover the truth. I think it would be wise for us to discuss potential suspects and any clues that might have been missed."
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso and we should investigate them further."
Diana: "I think we should focus on gathering more information and discussing potential motives before accusing anyone. We don't have enough evidence to point fingers yet."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
